short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override chrome new tab with background images from pexels.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Dash!" Chrome extension brings a touch of personalization to your browsing experience. Instead of seeing just a blank tab when you open a new tab, this extension replaces that page with a customized tab full of interesting features.


Firstly, you will be greeted by real-time weather information. The extension uses your location to display the current weather conditions, keeping you informed about temperatures, forecasts, and general weather conditions. Whether you're planning a sunny day at the beach or preparing for a downpour, you'll always have access to this essential information.


Additionally, the custom tab also offers a selection of random background images to liven up your browsing experience. Every time you open a new tab, you will be greeted by a different and unique image, allowing you to discover stunning landscapes, beautiful artworks, or even inspiring photographs. These background images create a pleasant ambiance and provide a visual break in your day.
